# stop()

**Instance Method**

Stops playback of the audio resource and discards the location in the audio stream.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency func stop()
```

## Discussion

The next time you call [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AudioPlaybackController/play()], playback starts at the beginning of the stream.

## Starting and stopping audio playback

- **play()**: Plays the audio resource.
- **pause()**: Pauses playback of the audio resource while maintaining the position in the audio stream.
- **isPlaying**: A Boolean value that indicates whether playback is currently active.
